#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{  int x;
   float y,bal;
   cin>>x>>y;
   if(x+0.5>y)
   {  printf("%.2f",y); }
   else if(x%5!=0)
   {  printf("%.2f",y); } 
   else
   {  bal=y-x-0.5;
      printf("%.2f",bal); 
   }
   cout<<endl;
   //system("pause");
   return 0;
}
